Introduction

NCT 127 is a nine-member boy group and the second sub-unit of NCT under SM Entertainment. They debuted on M Countdown on July 7, 2016, with their debut stage for "Fire Truck", the title track from their first mini album, NCT #127, released on the 10th.

The number '127' indicates the longitude of Seoul, which is their place of origin.

On January 6, 2017, the group made a comeback with two new members, Johnny and Doyoung. On September 17, 2018, Jungwoo was introduced as an additional unit member.

On August 28, 2024, SM Entertainment announced that Taeil would be officially leaving NCT 127 and NCT following sexual offense allegations.
